note: HFA/ADHD Panromantic Het who posts art for a bit of living.... WARNING SOME NSFW... I also have a Pawoo, called KirbyBisharp... Republican artist on the double...

name: 源平討魔伝/Genpei Toumaden
value: Usually I make Rule 34 erotica of this obscure Namco game series because there's not much of it. It's a good way to pretty much express my love towards pretty much Kagekiyo, the main character, and occasionally the bosses of the game series...
